admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed loan would help finance:
            (i) the construction and improvement to two-lane surfaced
            standards of approximately 14 km of the Vesturlandsvegur and
            34 km of the Sudurlandsvegur. The Vesturlandsvegur is the
            main highway going north from Reykjavik linking the capital
            with the western, northern and eastern parts of Iceland. The
            Sudurlandsvegur is the main highway going south linking
            Reykjavik with the main agricultural area; (ii) supervision
            of construction by consultants; and (iii) the replacement of
            selected items of old and uneconomic highway maintenance
            equipment, and the purchase of snow-clearing equipment for
            use on surfaced roads (largely on the project roads).
